abstract: Laurence D. Fink is no stranger to rough markets. As The New York Times reported last month, the chairman and chief executive of BlackRock is known for his emphasis on risk, making him a go-to figure during the credit market turmoil.
lead_paragraph: Laurence D. Fink is no stranger to rough markets. As The New York Times reported last month, the chairman and chief executive of BlackRock is known for his emphasis on risk, making him a go-to figure during the credit market turmoil.

headline.main: BlackRock’s Fink on Lehman and the Markets
